trial_identification.studytitle: Maxillary Three-Implant Overdentures: An Alternative Prosthodontic Treatment Concept with Opposing Mandibular Two-Implant Overdentures.
trial_identification.scientifictitle: Complete Tooth Loss:A Randomized Controlled Clincial Trial with Maxillary Three-Implant Overdentures Opposing Mandibular Two-Implant Overdentures.

conditioncode.conditioncode2: Other diseases of the mouth, teeth, oesophagus, digestive system including liver and colon

interventions.interventions: Placement of oral implants in the upper jaw and implant overdentures, when opposing lower jaw 2-implant overdentures.
interventions.comparator: Conventional complete maxillary dentures opposing mandibular 2-implant overdentures

primaryOutcome.outcome: To determine implant success of maxillary three-implant overdentures using splinted and unsplinted prosthodontic designs on narrow diameter roughened surface implants (with a one-stage surgical procedure and a 12-week healing period), when opposing mandibular two-implant overdentures.
primaryOutcome.timepoint: 52 weeks post procedure and 10 years post procedure

secondaryOutcome.outcome: To determine prosthodontic success of maxillary three-implant overdentures using splinted and unsplinted prosthodontic designs on narrow diameter roughened surface implants (with a one-stage surgical procedure and a 12-week healing period), when opposing mandibular two-implant overdentures.

eligibility.inclusivecriteria: An edentulous maxilla, and had been successfully wearing their mandibular two-implant overdenture for at least three years.
eligibility.exclusivecriteria: Those with Lekholm & Zarb classification16 Type E maxillae (determined radiologically), a history of smoking, a systemic disease likely to compromise implant surgery, previously bone-grafted jaws, or a history of bruxism.

sponsorship.primarysponsoraddress: 4/7 Eden Park Drive, Sydney NSW 2113, Australia

fundingsource.fundingaddress: 4/7 Eden Park Drive, Sydney NSW 2113, Australia
1 Albert Rd, Pretoria, 0062, South Africa PO Box 605, Irene, 0062, South Africa

secondarysponsor.sponsoraddress: 1 Albert Rd, Pretoria, 0062, South Africa PO Box 605, Irene, 0062, South Africa

ethicsAndSummary.summary: To determine the implant success and prosthetic maintenance of 3 upper jaw implants supporting an overdenture in patients with a lower jaw 2-implant overdenture over a 10-year period.
ethicsAndSummary.publication:
Al-Zubeidi M., Alsabeeha N, Thomson WM, Payne AGT. (2012) Patient outcomes with maxillary 3-implant overdentures opposing mandibular 2-implant overdentures. Clin Implant Dent Relat Res 2012;14,(suppl)1:e11-19.
Ma S, Tawse-Smith A, De Silva RK, Atieh MA, Alsabeeha NHM, Payne AGT. Maxillary 3-implant overdentures opposing mandibular 2-implant overdentures: 10-year surgical outcomes of a randomized controlled trial. Clin Implant Dent Relat Res 2015 doi: 10.1111/cid.12325.
Ma S, Waddell JN, Atieh MA, Alsabeeha NHM, Payne AGT. Maxillary 3-implant overdentures opposing mandibular 2-implant overdentures: 10-year prosthodontic outcomes of a randomized controlled trial. Int J Prosthodontics- submitted for publication

ethicscommitee.ethicname: New Zealand - Lower South Island Ethics Committee
